publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5381 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Rule 9.6.3Aâ€”That the Parliament agrees under Rule 9.6.3A that the Parliament shall consider the general principles of the Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill on the fourth sitting day after the publication of the lead committee report. Supported by: George Lyon*
